summary:
With the creation kit I've made two new spells:
Trifecta- It has all of the effects of Flames, Frostbite, and Sparks and drains your foe's magic
Super Healing- 5 times more powerful than Healing
Both can be found around the well in Whiterun. If you have any suggestions please comment and I'll see what I can do.
descriptionHtml:
With the creation kit I've made two new spells:
Trifecta- It has all of the effects of Flames, Frostbite, and Sparks and drains your foe's magic
Super Healing- 5 times more powerful than Healing
Both can be found around the well in Whiterun. If you have any suggestions please comment and I'll see what I can do.
P. S. I'm still an amateur when it comes to the creation kit and mods so don't expect a miracle.
author: cordack
